plot: A man stuck in a boring life meets a sexy new coworker and is catapulted into a vivid, fractured dream in which he must save her from his villainous boss.
title: Dream in Color
plot_es: A man stuck in a boring life meets a sexy new coworker and is catapulted into a vivid, fractured dream in which he must save her from his villainous boss.
plot_en: A man stuck in a boring life meets a sexy new coworker and is catapulted into a vivid, fractured dream in which he must save her from his villainous boss.
